alert.note: Alert for Gibson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 30 at 10:02PM EDT until April 03 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Patoka River near Princeton .The Patoka River will rise above flood stage late tonight and crest around 18.4 feet early Saturday morning. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Patoka River near Princeton. * WHEN...Until early Monday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 17.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow morning to a crest of 18.4 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
